original_text: Why? Because they did not pursue it by faith, but as if it were based on works. They have stumbled over the stumbling stone,
korean_text: 어찌 그러하냐 이는 그들이 믿음을 의지하지 않고 행위를 의지함이라 부딪칠 돌에 부딪쳤느니라

sentences.original_text: Because they did not pursue it by faith,
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 믿음으로 그것을 추구하지 않았기 때문입니다,

sentences.original_text: but as if it were based on works.
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 마치 행위에 기반한 것처럼 추구했습니다.

sentences.original_text: They have stumbled over the stumbling stone,
